Topic.Title: New deal in the works per Venture Capital Post article

Message.Msg: I google that and see nothing. What do I google to access that article?
Explosive alerts is my most reccommended

I'm going to hold on to my 1,000 shares of DELL at $13.13/share mainly because of Carl Icahn taking this massive position at $13.52/share a few weeks ago. I really don't need to know anything else about DELL, as far as I am concerned. I'm a huge fan of Carl Icahn. He's done great things for the performance of TTWO in the past by sticking his toe in the pool over there, and I've made amazing profits in TTWO because of it. If he's willing to take on the amount of risk that he did with his much larger position in DELL, then I am willing to do it with my much smaller position in DELL, too. One thing that I learned a long time ago regarding Wall Street... Always bet with the rich. Always.

Message.Title: Michael Dell
Message.Msg: Much has been said about this SOB. But long term holders of Dell know best! Early on he was great then went to good then fair then to #$%$ poor and now he is a menace! If he survives, Dell will not!

Message.Title: For the first time NATIONAL DEBT GOES OVER 17 TRILLION in less than 24 hr
Message.Msg: It keeps getting bigger and as interest rates go higher, the rate of its growth increases. This will be a huge burden left on our children to deal with.

Topic.Title: For the first time NATIONAL DEBT GOES OVER 17 TRILLION in less than 24 hr

Message.Msg: Yup. Money in and of itself is going to become basically worthless if this trend with the national debt keeps up, so you might as well have it invested in stocks like DELL instead! LOL.

Topic.Title: For the first time NATIONAL DEBT GOES OVER 17 TRILLION in less than 24 hr

Message.Msg: The government has plenty of land that can be sold to raise revenue. No worries! Not sure if you have been to Hong Kong before. It runs a "surplus" and has more money in treasury than it knows how to spend. Most of the "money" comes from land sales. Why can't the U.S. do the same?

Message.Title: Options activity from Friday
Message.Msg: Check out the Feb 14 calls.....traded higher and a TON of volume as the stock sold off.,....it's going higher, Mike is upping his bid to 15 or Carl pulls a rabbit out of his hat.

Actually that's a bearish sign.people wwrote the calls don't think the price will ever hit $14.MD is not going to up the bid.the only hope is this deal goes through or the stock will lose half of its value.
